generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and a speed limit marking "30".

- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast.

- fence: A fence is visible behind the parked cars on the left side of the road.
- pole: A pole is visible near the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
